ARABIC: وَأَمْطَرْنَا عَلَيْهِم مَّطَرًا فَسَآءَ مَطَرُ ٱلْمُنذَرِينَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: We rained down a rain upon them. How evil is the rain of those who are warned!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: And We rained down on them a shower (of stones). How ruinous was the rain that fell on those who had been warned (but warned in vain)!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: And We rained down upon them a rain. It was an evil rain for those who had already been warned.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: We sent to them a terrible rainstorm. How horrible was the rain for the people who had already received warning.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And We showered a rain upon them; so what a wretched rain for those who were warned!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And We rained down on them a rain. So, evil was the rain of those who were warned.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And We rained on them a rain, and evil was the rain of those who had been warned.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: And We rained on them a rain; and evil indeed is the rain of them that are warned.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And We rained a rain upon them. Dreadful is the rain of those who have been warned.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: and We pelted them with torrential rain. How dreadful that rain was for those who had been warned!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And We rained upon them a rain; ill was the rain upon the warned.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Then We poured down upon them a rain [of stones]. Evil was that rain for those who had been warned!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And We rained down on them a shower (of brimstone): and evil was the shower on those who were admonished (but heeded not)!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And We rained down on them a rain (of stones). So evil was the rain of those who were warned.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: And we rained on them a rain (of stones); indeed it is an evil rain that rains on those that are warned.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And We rained upon them a rain. Miserable was the rain of those forewarned.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And We rained upon them a rain [of stones], and evil was the rain of those who were warned.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [27:58] Then We rained on them a rain — these were the stones of baked mud [cf. Q. 15:74] — which destroyed them. And evil indeed was, their rain, the rain of those who were warned, against chastisement.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And We rained a rain) stones (upon them) upon their sodomites and travellers. (Dreadful) evil (is the rain of those who have been warned) by Lot but did not believe in him.
